name: International Peace Festival | Festival International De La Paix (IPF | FIP)
description: Celebrating the UN International Day of Peace. Entry to the Welcoming Ceremony is Free. The festival program will continue through the week of September 21 - 27 with musical performances, art exhibitions, film screenings, panel discussions, a conference on cultural heritage and peace, and the IPF Peace Ambassadors Gala and Awards Ceremony & Concert.  For additional information, check the festival website.

organizer.name: International Peace Festival | Festival International de la Paix (IPF | FIP)

name: Community Environment Day at Enbridge Gas
description:
Join Councillor Carroll (Ward 17) and the City of Toronto to help reduce the amount of waste going to landfill. Drop off household items for donation, electronics for reuse or recycling and household hazardous waste for proper disposal. 

Pick up free bagged compost while supplies last and kitchen catchers for organics ($7 each â€“ cash, debit and credit accepted).
